title: Mechanism of SO2/H2O enhanced rare earth tailings catalysts in NH3-SCR at medium and high temperature
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7206-7214
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08782D, Paper

Kunling Jiao, Jiaming Liu, Xiaoyun Jiao, Siying Wang, Jingran Zhang, Wenfei Wu
Rare earth tailings (RET) NH3-SCR catalysts were prepared by mechanical and microwave activation of a large amount of rare earth tailings after beneficiation of Bayan Ebo rare earth ore.
